description: Everyone is busy with preparations for the forthcoming school festival, except for http://anidb.net/ch31165 [Daigo]. But when http://anidb.net/ch31164 [Ayumu] tells him how http://anidb.net/ch25925 [Ui] misunderstood his request for modeling to his drawing and began to undress, Daigo can`t think of anything but finding a way of some girl showing him her nude body, getting him in ever new and ever more embarrassing situations.

titles.title: Can it Be Crossed? The Bridge of Love at the School Festival
Kakaru ka? Gakuensai ni Koi no Hashi
架かるか? 学園祭に恋の橋
